body.p: Type in a expression then click on the button:

If the Applet box above is gray, or non-functional, it is likely that your browser does not support Java. In particular, Microsoft no longer distributes their Java VM. You may install the Sun Java Plug-in. Go to http://java.sun.com/products/plugin/ and follow the "Download the JRE" link, and install.
